lines.text: Opal, you didn't, like, bring a statue in here just to confuse us more, right?
What would that even- even accomplish?
Confusing us more. With red herrings. Like I just said.
N-no. No, I- I maintain that I haven't tampered with this crime scene.
As in, a pasty nerd who never goes outside.
I- you- the report I'll be filing to HR, you- it's going to be longer than-
As in, she's completely incapable of luggin' a man-sized statue up four stories, and can't have done what you're accusin' her of.
